metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23451 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An authorization flaw was found in openstack-barbican. The default policyrules for the secret metadata API allowed any authenticated user to add,modify, or delete metadata from any secret regardless of ownership. Thisflaw allows an attacker on the network to modify or delete protected data,causing a denial of service by consuming protected resources.

criterions.comment: barbican: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
